responsibilities: Develop solutions to scale message queue and streaming infrastructure used by product engineers.
Support data infrastructure comprised of Kafka, Airflow, RabbitMQ, Trino, and GCP equivalent alternatives.
Work with users to determine capacity and functionality requirements, develop monitoring tools, and maintain reliable operations.
Partner with database teams to understand optimal configuration for applications using stateful and stateless services.
Collaborate on data migration tooling, change data capture analytics pipelines, and streaming solutions for realtime feeds.
Migrate infrastructure to the cloud using GCP and explore alternatives for message queues, orchestration, streaming, and CDC.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The Job Responsibilities focus on developing and supporting data infrastructure, message queues, streaming solutions, and cloud migration. There is no mention of working with language models or tasks related to fine-tuning or customizing them. The responsibilities are more aligned with infrastructure and data engineering rather than machine learning or language model tasks.
